name: Slime Safari
description:
SLIME SAFARI

Please enjoy this technical demo of a Slime on a mission: To gobble up as many juicy things as possible.  Devour flowers, mushrooms ... and even trees once you reach a size worthy of a king slime!

If you can't eat something yet, fret not.  Just get bigger by eating smaller things.  The slime will tell you if he's biting off more than he can chew by changing colors.

GAME FEATURES

Precious Animated Slime Character

Forest Chock-Full of Consumable Items!

Growing Mechanics!

TECHNICAL DEMO

We made this game based on a sudden flash of inspiration.  Sadly, at the moment we have no plans of making a full game, but the potential is there in the future.
